content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 3 ** join my fb group 1 to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns > this pattern is part of my 6 different c2c crochet stitches vol 1 /patterns/sources/6-different-c2c-crochet-stitches-vol-1 > ebook save and get the ebook the wattle stitch has such a beautiful texture it looks like a million little flowers i took this beautiful stitch and made it into a corner to corner method c2c is my favorite way of working blankets and washcloths it gives you the flexibility to decide the finished measurements of your work as you go **the pattern can be worked as a square or a rectangle ** the free video tutorial can be found here https //youtu be/y9l94exki4i 4 this stitch is great for a washcloth or a very soft blanket it s repetitive and so easy totally mindless crocheting the pattern is available for free on my blog copyright © 2024 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this design are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/5-different-c2c-crochet-stitches 3 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up 4 https //youtu be/y9l94exki4i
